scripts.build: (cd ./packages/rapida-common && yarn build) && (cd ./packages/postprocessing && yarn build) && (cd ./packages/cannon-worker && yarn build) && (cd ./packages/recs && yarn build) && (cd ./packages/rapida && yarn build)
scripts.test: (cd ./packages/rapida-common && yarn test) && (cd ./packages/rapida && yarn test) && (cd ./packages/recs && yarn test)
scripts.release: yarn build && yarn test && yarn website:build
scripts.website:docs: yarn docs && rm -rf website/generated/docs && mkdir -p website/generated/docs && cp -R packages/rapida/docs website/generated/docs/rapida && cp -R packages/cannon-worker/docs website/generated/docs/cannon-worker && cp -R packages/recs/docs website/generated/docs/recs && cp -R packages/postprocessing/docs website/generated/docs/postprocessing
scripts.website:storybooks: yarn storybook:build && rm -rf ./website/public/storybooks && mkdir -p ./website/public/storybooks && cp -R packages/rapida/storybook-static website/public/storybooks/rapida && cp -R packages/cannon-worker/storybook-static website/public/storybooks/cannon-worker
scripts.website:build: yarn website:storybooks && yarn website:docs && (cd website && yarn build)
